long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Manga Translator Chrome Extension Introduction and Usage Guide

Introduction

The AI Manga Translator Chrome extension provides users with a seamless way to translate manga and comics from various languages using advanced AI technology. It supports multiple languages and ensures the preservation of the original artwork while translating the text accurately.

Features

•Easy Upload: Quickly upload your manga images.
•Multiple Languages: Supports various languages for translation.
•High Accuracy: Utilizes top AI translation engines like DeepL for precise translations.
•Free Plan: Offers a free plan with a limited number of translations per week.

Usage Instructions

1.Install the Extension: Add the AI Manga Translator extension to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
2.Upload Manga: Click on the extension icon, and upload the manga image you wish to translate.
3.Select Language: Choose the desired output language from the list of supported languages.
4.Translate: Click on the ‘Translate’ button. The AI will process the image and provide the translated text.
5.Download/Read: View the translated manga directly in the browser or download it for offline reading.

Support

For troubleshooting or further assistance, contact the support team via email at support@aimangatranslator.com.

For more details, visit the AI Manga Translator website.
